title: 04/07/21 DPS Hour 2 Bubba Watson
itunes:title: 04/07/21 DPS Hour 2 Bubba Watson
description:
Bubba Watson tells Dan that if he had to play a golf course with one club, it would be a 7 iron. Bubba says that he has played a round with all the clubs in his bag; and that the 7 iron is the one club that always works.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
